Operation 'get_/facets/{facet}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary 'Returns facets' is too generic and doesn't indicate the action or purpose. Description is completely empty, providing no guidance to AI agents about what this operation does, what inputs it expects, or what it returns. The improved version clarifies that this retrieves facet values for filtering, explains the facet parameter requirement, describes the response structure with value counts, and mentions pagination support. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation for result filtering and navigation.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve available facet values for filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves available facet values for the specified facet type, enabling result filtering and navigation. Accepts a facet name parameter and optional query filters. Returns a list of facet values with counts indicating how many documents match each value. Supports pagination and sorting of facet results.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Returns facets' is too generic and doesn't indicate the action or purpose. Description is completely empty, providing no guidance to AI agents about what this operation does, what inputs it expects, or what it returns. The improved version clarifies that this retrieves facet values for filtering, explains the facet parameter requirement, describes the response structure with value counts, and mentions pagination support. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation for result filtering and navigation.

message: Operation 'get_/search/entity' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented, appropriately using domain terminology ('WeGA entity'). However, description is too vague and lacks critical details. It doesn't explain what parameters are expected (query term, filters), what the response contains (identifiers, titles, relevance), or how the search works (full-text search). The improved description specifies input parameters, response structure, and search capabilities, enabling AI agents to understand what data to provide and what results to expect.

data.current_description: This endpoint returns the search results for an entity's name or title.
data.description_suggestion: Searches the WeGA digital edition for entities by name or title. Accepts a query parameter containing the search term and optional filters for entity type and result limiting. Returns matching entities with their identifiers, titles, and relevance information. Supports full-text search across entity names and titles in the WeGA collection.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented, appropriately using domain terminology ('WeGA entity'). However, description is too vague and lacks critical details. It doesn't explain what parameters are expected (query term, filters), what the response contains (identifiers, titles, relevance), or how the search works (full-text search). The improved description specifies input parameters, response structure, and search capabilities, enabling AI agents to understand what data to provide and what results to expect.

data.current_description: This endpoint returns a list of documents that reference a particular docID  optionally filtered by document type.
data.summary_suggestion: Find documents that reference a specific document
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all documents that contain references or mentions of a specified document (identified by docID). Accepts a docID parameter and supports optional filtering by document type and other parameters. Returns a list of documents that cite or reference the specified document. Useful for discovering document relationships and citation networks within the WeGA digital edition.
